item.title: Yellowcard - Lights And Sounds
item.description:
Hello you how
was the rest
You made it through
but nevertheless
I got you out on a
wire You be love
and I’ll
be a liar
Tell it all
and fill up
the air
But make it loud
cause
Nobody’s there
nobody’s there
nobody’s there
Stop turn take
a look around
At all the
lights and sounds
Let them
bring you in
Slow burn
let it all fade out
Pull the
curtain down
And wonder
where you’ve been
Make it new but
stay in the lines
Just let go but
keep it inside
Smile big for
everyone Even
when you know
what they’ve done
They gave you
the end
but not
where to start
Not how to build how
to tear it apart
So tell it all and
fill up the air
But make it loud
cuz nobody’s there
Nobody’s there
Stop turn
take a look
around
At all the
lights and sounds
Let them
bring you in
Slow burn
let it all fade out
Pull the
curtain down
And wonder
where you’ve been

I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got a way
and you know how
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got a way
and you know how
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got
a way
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got a way
and you know how
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got
a way
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got a way
and you know how
I’ve got a way
to work this out
I’ve got
a way
Stop turn
take a look around
At all the
lights and sounds
Let them
bring you in
Slow burn
let it all fade out
Pull the
curtain down
And wonder
where you’ve been
You’ve earned
everything
you’ve
found
Painted
faces frown
I’ll say
I knew you when
